snippet: After reports that a particle resembling the long-sought Higgs boson was discovered, physicists are looking to see if it’s time to pay up on bets about the boson’s existence.
abstract: Dennis Overbye Out There column speculates that a number of physicists are now examining data on the existence of the Higgs boson to see whether the time has come to pay up on bets they made with their colleagues; notes that some physicists who bet against the particle's discovery have already conceded defeat.
lead_paragraph: After reports that a particle resembling the long-sought Higgs boson was discovered, physicists are looking to see if it’s time to pay up on bets about the boson’s existence.

headline.print_headline: After Particle Search, Some Wallets May Lose Mass
headline.seo: Higgs Boson News Leads Physicists to Settle Bets
headline.main: After Particle Search, Some Wallets May Lose Mass
